content:
# The stone furnace is now operational, showing the status 'WORKING' with 4 coal remaining as fuel and 9 iron ore available for smelting.
#
# The furnace is actively processing the iron ore into iron plates. I need to wait for the smelting process to complete, which may take some time.

# I will monitor the furnace to check when the iron plates are ready. Let's wait for a maximum of 30 seconds to see if the smelting completes within that time frame.

for _ in range(30):  # Maximum wait time of 30 seconds
    if inspect_inventory(stone_furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate] >= 10:  # Check if 10 iron plates are produced
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")  # Raise an error if smelting takes too long

# Once the iron plates are ready, I will proceed to craft the iron gear wheels.
